text: Dekheṅ, jo ḳhidmat āp īmān se saranjām de rahe haiṅ wuh ek aisī qurbānī hai jo Allāh ko pasand hai. Ḳhudā kare ki jo dukh maiṅ uṭhā rahā hūṅ wuh mai kī us nazar kī mānind ho jo Baitul-muqaddas meṅ qurbānī par unḍelī jātī hai. Agar merī nazar wāqaī āp kī qurbānī yoṅ mukammal kare to maiṅ ḳhush hūṅ aur āp ke sāth ḳhushī manātā hūṅ.
